caption.p: a. Classification of HFMD based on treatment history and laboratory analysis. b, Location of Qinghai Province and Shanghai Municipality, China. c/d, Annual average incidence of HFMD in Qinghai/Shanghai. SH = Shanghai; QH = Qinghai. The map a, c, and d were created using ArcGIS software (version 10.4.1, ESRI Inc. Redlands, CA).
